title: Marketplace Roundtable #13: Hedging Your Way To Alpha With Rick Pendergraft
description: Long-time market commentator and stock picker Rick Pendergraft sits down with Seeking Alpha's Jonathan Liss to discuss his approach to investing and the current macro environment. Rick believes in a 3-pronged approach of fundamental, technical and sentiment analysis to ensure all of his investment picks are built on a strong foundation. It's an approach he references regularly in his newly-launched Marketplace service, The Hedged Alpha Strategy.

itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: A 3-pronged approach to investing that utilizes fundamental, technical and sentiment analysis to ensure all of your stock picks are built on a strong foundation
